Dedicated to the continued excellence of the
Chagrin Falls School District

We are here to support educational programs and experiences that enrich the opportunities available to the students attending and the faculty of the Chagrin Falls Exempted Village School District.

More About Us

  • Donate

    We can only exist through the generosity of our donors. Give what you can to help.

  • Volunteer

    Have a special skill or experience that can enhance the cause? Let us know how you can help.

  • Share

    Let others know about CFEF and how they can help enrich the opportunities available.
